name: Maze Escape (itch) (Mikha, RigsInRags)
description:
An Atari-style maze escape game made for our Games Engineering coursework.

Make your way through the winding maze and reach the escape ladder before the time runs out! Thankfully there are various items that may help you, such as maps and weapons!

Made by Liam Blair and Mikha Walter Röhrs

Github: https://github.com/MikhaRohrs/Maze-Escape
